gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nuggets 131, Pistons 114
gameRecap.excerpt: The Nuggets defeated the Pistons, 131-114. Jamal Murray led all scorers with 37 points (14-24 FG), along with five rebounds and four assists for the Nuggets, while Nikola Jokic added four points, seven rebounds and 16 assists in the victory. Jalen Duren tallied 20 points (8-12 FG), five rebounds and four assists for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Nuggets improve to 26-12 on the season, while the Pistons fall to 3-33.
